meta.description: The "Pandemic of the Unvaccinated" is a politically correct term used to shame those who have not submitted to the jab. But, is it true?

title: Covid 19 and the Pandemic of the Unvaccinated
cleaned_text: Debates about creation often come with high emotions, and to some extent this makes sense. Many of the issues...
